## Tanana
#### Load centerline data and pressure transducer locations
```{r Tanana spatial, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(sf)

#setwd("input")
Tanana_cl <- shapefile("input/Centerline/Tan_cl.shp")

```
#### Get elevation data

```{r Tanana DEM, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(elevatr)
Tanana_WSE <- readRDS("input/WSE/Tanana_WSE_Q_15_min.rds")
Tanana_DEM <- raster("input/DEM/Merged_Tan_DEM.tif")


```
